channel.title: {508} helps
channel.description: ok i have shops added to my 508 server BUT i dont wanna edit the ones that are in thier already so i went 2 autospawn.cfg and added for example... a fiary_shopkeeper well when i spawned her it automatically set up a shop that i already had w/ a diff npc in a diff place aka donar area i want 2 change the fiary_shopkeeper without changing the donar shop but i cnt becuase thier both labled as donar shop >.<? how can i fix this? maybe client.java and edit the donar shop? like copy/ past eit underneath create a diff shop?

item.title: {508} helps
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

What?

It’s hard to read what you are saying, please use the period mark. (.)

But if I understand what you are asking, you just need to change the donar_shop name.

Read full topic
